arts.ttl: 'Nothing's changed' - Middlesbrough boss Michael Carrick responds to Ben Doak transfer talk - Teesside Live
arts.sum: Michael Carrick insists nothing has changed from his point of view and says Middlesbrough remain calm about Ben Doak’s situation amid transfer offers from Premier League clubs. Asked about the situation and the potential to lose such an important player this month, Carrick said: “Nothing's changed.

arts.ttl: Boro ratings vs Cardiff as Ben Doak highlights his importance amid transfer talk
arts.sum: Not helped by a poor refereeing display, Boro were ultimately just a bit flat after taking the lead through Emmanuel Latte Lath in just the 12th minute. Boro’s best player - he made clear his importance for Boro as he had a lively first half down the right which included creating the goal, and then got back into the game in the final 20 minutes when switched to the left.

arts.ttl: Calum Chambers nets rare goal to earn Cardiff point at high-flying Middlesbrough
arts.sum: Chambers’ last goal came in March 2022 for Aston Villa.

arts.ttl: Ponderous Middlesbrough frustrated in Cardiff City draw as more points are dropped
arts.sum: Emmanuel Latte Lath gave Boro an early lead, only for former loan man Calum Chambers to cancel it out just ten minutes later. Latte Lath did his job, getting ahead of Dimitrios Goutas at the front post to flick home first time.

arts.ttl: Middlesbrough 1-1 Cardiff City: Calum Chambers stunner and stoic defensive display earns Bluebirds draw
arts.sum: The Bluebirds travelled to Teesside and earned a creditable 1-1 draw

arts.ttl: Kortrijk set to welcome Cardiff City defender back on loan for a second spell
arts.sum: According to Wales Online reporter Glen Williams, Kortrijk are set to welcome back Ryotaro Tsunoda on loan from Cardiff City for the rest of the season. The 25-year-old Japanese defender has…

arts.ttl: Middlesbrough v Cardiff City Live: Kick-off time, team news and score updates
arts.sum: The Bluebirds travel to Teesside looking to earn back-to-back away wins

arts.ttl: Andy Campbell details Middlesbrough career low point that led to huge Cardiff City moment
arts.sum: Speaking to Dr Tosh Warwick for the Boro match-day programme #UTB, Campbell said: "To play for my club in my town in front of all my friends and family was the best feeling ever! The boyhood Boro fan went from watching his club from the stands to scoring memorable goals against Sunderland and Manchester United and also helping Bryan Robson's side win promotion back to the Premier League .

arts.ttl: Key thing Middlesbrough must do as Michael Carrick looks for springboard against Cardiff City
arts.sum: “As a team, to win 1-0 in that manner - we looked really solid in the most part, pressed really well and then, in the second half in particular, looked dangerous and controlled the game - collectively it was a really good performance away from home on a difficult pitch. Michael Carrick is hoping his Middlesbrough players use the late victory against Hull City as a springboard as he seeks greater consistency from his side this year.

arts.ttl: Middlesbrough face anxious wait as Premier League clubs make Ben Doak transfer approach
arts.sum: However, they now face an anxious wait to see if they can keep a hold of one of their key players this month with clubs pushing to sign Doak on a permanent deal. Doak, 19, joined the club in the summer on a season-long loan deal from Liverpool and he has enjoyed a strong first half of the season under Michael Carrick .
